name: Starbucks crusade
description:
You find yourself in a kitchen, but your goal isn't to make the customer happy, your goal is to kill him.

Then with what you found on the last customer make a smoothie for the next one.

INFORMATION:

  1. Yes the game run terribly but I don't have time to fix this
  2. The cheese kill everyone because everyone is lactose intolerance in this world
  3. This was made in 7 days for the weekly game jam #196
